item.description:
We'll start at 6 but come later if you can.

Bring a picnic.dinner and bug spray (just in case) - no open containers please... so if you choose to imbibe recreational libationis please conceal in a water bottle etc.

We'll meet rain or shine. If it does rain we'll go hang out at Marc Anthony's of Captain Al's

see you there - R

If it rains we'll still meet and go out to Marc Anthony's or Captain Al's so still show up...

wear sandals or sneakers... plenty of clam shells and small rocks on the beach... we have been raking tho... not bad but some footwear is good.
item.how_to_find_us: look for the volleyball net towards the end of the beach

group.name: South Shore Hike, Bike & Social Club

item.name: Volleyball on LIttle Harbor Beach in Wareham
